metadata.title: CVE-2024-24478 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: An issue in Wireshark team Wireshark before v.4.2.0 allows a remoteattacker to cause a denial of service via the packet-bgp.c,dissect_bgp_open(tvbuff_t*tvb, proto_tree*tree, packet_info*pinfo), optlencomponents.

criterions.comment: wireshark package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
